miniskama: ipadima ha nawatha ipadima - thunwana kotasa ipadima ha nawatha ipadima - thunwana kotasa nawatha nawatha ipadima hadarima thulin dutu minis lokaya mehi di, me lipi thulin eli dak wu thorathuru walata bandi saba lowa sitina minisun yoda thahawuru karagath de thulin ma dutu karunu anuwa, minisun samanga men ma an sathun samanga athi bandima gath kala, na hithawath kam thulin kiyana de apata itha wadagath ya.
